JUNIORS & SENIORS:

A College Night and Financial Aid Meeting will be held on October 9th. College Night is 5:00-6:30 pm and the Financial Aid Meeting is at 6:30 pm in the library at Pampa High School.

A day or two prior to the event, students will receive a barcode that contains their contact information as it is in TxEIS. The students should receive an email from GotoCollegeFairs.com in their school email account. Please do not delete that email. This email will give you log in information to access the profile that is set up. When you log in, you should change the email and contact number to your personal email and cell; otherwise, recruiters will contact your parents.
